attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD. When I downloaded this app it took my photos of my dead fish and posted them 😭. After that everyone saw them. The notifications for the app, EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THEM SAID “haha your fish is dead” after the app posted my photos with out consent 😭.

attributes.review: downloaded app n as soon as i open it i’m greeted with this shriveled up orange thing. i’m not sure what that’s supposed to be. my phone started glitching right away and the screen shattered. wasn’t too mad about it tho bc i couldn’t see the moldy cheeto thing on the screen anymore. i’m terrified of seeing that image again. definitely don’t recommend the app for anyone. should be taken off the app store asap.

Worst app I’ve ever used. First, it took 80+ hours download, and froze my phone up until the download finished. Once I opened up the app I was BOMBARDED with pop ups, notifications, and requests to donate money to the company.
Horrible, horrible, horrible app.
